EPI.Menu.Name: Encounter+ Importer
EPI.Menu.Label: Open Importer
EPI.Menu.Hint: Import an Encounter+ export (JSON/XML) into Foundry.
EPI.App.Title: Encounter+ Importer
EPI.Help: Point to the extracted Encounter+ export folder (module.xml/pages.json, etc.).
EPI.Note: After import, check the created folders in Actors/Items/Journals/Scenes. Open F12 â†’ Console if some entries fail.
EPI.Settings.SourcePath.Name: Encounter+ source folder
EPI.Settings.SourcePath.Hint: Data path to the extracted folder containing pages.json, maps.json, monsters.json, items.json, etc. Example: encounter-source/lost-mine-of-phandelver
EPI.Settings.Prefix.Name: Imported folder prefix
EPI.Settings.Prefix.Hint: Name used to create folders (Journals, Scenes, Actors, Items, Tables).
EPI.Settings.Destination.Name: Import destination
EPI.Settings.Destination.Hint: For now: import into World directories.
